channel.title: memcache on IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in memcache on IT Quicktasks

item.title: php7.1 memcache install in CentOS7
item.description: yum install -y memcached libmemcached php71-php-pecl-memcache.x86_64 Harden memcached by at least making it listed only on loopback. Config is in /etc/sysonfig/memcached PORT="11211" USER="memcached" MAXCONN="1024" CACHESIZE="64" OPTIONS="-l 127.0.0.1 -U 0" Details in https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-and-secure-memcached-on-centos-7

item.title: Drupal Memcache
item.description: Had to install as follows (need to be php7.x): pecl install memcached Dependencies may need to be installed # yum groupinstall "Development tools" # yum install zlib zlib-devel # yum install php php-devel php-pear echo "extension=memcache.so" >> /etc/php.d/memcache.ini See https://tecadmin.net/install-memcached-with-pecl-memcache-on-centos-rhel/ For Ubuntu 16.x (with php5.6.x) apt-get install memcached apt-get install php-memcache
